item.description:
You are invited to the first Rhythmic Explorations class of 2012!

 

Rhythmic Explorations is new World Drumming organization taking an eclectic approach to traditional drumming.  Courses are arranged in comprehensive 8 week cycles incorporating many styles of drumming and rhythms from around the World!

Local performances may be scheduled for classes to show off they're skills!

 

We are starting off this year with a free sample class!

7:15pm Wednesday January 18th at the Cambridge YMCA

 

The first classes of this 8 week cycle will begin the following week.

Level 1 -Rhythmic Explorations officially begins Wednesday January 25th

Level 2 - Further Explorations officially begins Tuesday January 24th

 

Level 1 is not your typical beginner class as there are many rhythms, concepts and compositions for even the advanced drummer.

Level 2 is a mixed level course for those that have taken Rhythmic Explorations courses in the past and would like to continue.  New drummers are welcome in this class too, but watch out because these students are hot on the drums!

 

 

If you are looking for a new place to drum, please come and feel free to bring a friend.

Extra drums are available for those without.
item.name: World Drumming Class - Free sample Rhythmic Explorations gathering.
